summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5049 for the improvement of Willow Street, from Empire Way to Rainier Avenue, by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 58061 as amended by Ordinance No. 58332, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
